results.deck: Extreme Exorcism is the story of Mae Barrons, an exorcist that rids houses of ghosts. But, each ghost she kills spawns another that retraces her every move.
results.name: Extreme Exorcism

results.deck: A 2D Horror-RPG inspired by the infamous canceled Wii game Sadness.
results.name: Sadness & Solitude

results.deck: A supernatural first-person open-world horror game. Victor Lupus inherits his uncle's private island after he went missing seven years ago. Trying to uncover what truly happened to his uncle, Victor unknowingly exposes himself to the enigma of Satanism.
results.name: Werewolf Island

results.deck: Revelations 2 sees the return of Claire Redfield, who along with the daughter of Barry Burton, Moira Burton, must try to escape from a monster-infested island. Meanwhile, Barry Burton himself makes his belated return as well in his attempts to save his daughter with the assistance of a little girl called Natalia Korda.
results.name: Resident Evil: Revelations 2

results.deck: Developed by SinnDevelopment, this game about running infinitely has no relation to Wales Interactive's game of the same name. Coming Winter 2014.
results.name: Infinity Runner

results.deck: Soul Axiom is a futuristic first-person adventure game from Wales Interactive.
results.name: Soul Axiom

results.deck: Heather “Athena” Quinn must run through various styles of first-person shooters in her quest to get back home. Based on a book by the same name.
results.name: Bedlam

results.deck: An arcade-puzzle game developed by Unfinished Pixel.
results.name: Spy Chameleon RGB Agent

results.deck: A mix of Action RPG and Tower Defense
results.name: Deathtrap

results.deck: Wild Season is an RPG, Farming, Life, Simulation Game developed by Quickfire Games. The game revolves around how the main character must manage & mantain a farm, while dealing with the trappings of every day farm life and the end of the world.
results.name: Wild Season

results.deck: A Lacrosse simulation game coming to PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC.
results.name: Lacrosse 15

results.deck: When The Boss is captured by Satan, it's up to Johnny Gat and Kenzie Kensington to cause as much chaos as possible in Hell to rescue them in this standalone expansion to Saints Row IV.
results.name: Saints Row: Gat Out of Hell

results.deck: A yoga action platformer utilizing the Kinect and PlayStation Camera.
results.name: Commander Cherry's Puzzled Journey

results.deck: The Star Wars universe enters the fray as Disney's Infinity platform grows to include a third installment.
results.name: Disney Infinity 3.0 Edition

results.deck: Fibbage is the lying, bluffing, fib-till-you-win trivia party game from the makers of YOU DON’T KNOW JACK!
results.name: Fibbage

results.deck: The Legend of Lobodestroyo vs. La Liga de Los Villanos, or just "Lobodestroyo" for short, is a 3D platformer starring a luchadore wolf.
results.name: The Legend of Lobodestroyo vs. La Liga de Los Villanos

results.deck: An exploration of the impact a single man had on several people's lives.
results.name: Fragments of Him

results.deck: The popular reality show about a family of heavily bearded duck hunters is now a video game from Fun Labs.
results.name: Duck Dynasty

results.deck: Local multiplayer game in the style of Worms.
results.name: Mayan Death Robots

results.deck: SteamWorld Heist is a sidescrolling turn-based tactics game in the SteamWorld universe. It takes place many years after the planet in SteamWorld Dig was destroyed.
results.name: SteamWorld Heist

results.deck: A version of the robot and base-building strategy game based on Tatsunoko's legendary anime properties.
results.name: Azito x Tatsunoko

results.deck: The sequel to Black Forest Games' platformer.
results.name: Giana Sisters 2

results.deck: Indie platfomer focused on momentum.
results.name: The Sun and Moon

results.deck: A motorcycle racing game with a heavy focus on bike customization. From the makers of the MotoGP series.
results.name: RIDE

results.deck: Formula Fusion is a futuristic racing game from R8 Games, which consists of many of the people who developed Wipeout before the closure of SCEE Liverpool.
results.name: Formula Fusion

results.deck: A 2D side-scrolling adventure. Pip can evolve by consuming pixels from defeated enemies.
results.name: Adventures of Pip

results.deck: A side scrolling shoot 'em up with kitties.
results.name: Naughty Kitties

results.deck: A platforming game that has players using their quarks and reflexes to overcome puzzles.
results.name: Schrödinger's Cat and the Raiders of the Lost Quark

results.deck: The final update to Dead or Alive 5 brings the game to PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. Last Round features more characters, stages, and costumes than any other Dead or Alive game to date.
results.name: Dead or Alive 5 Last Round

results.deck: Rivals of Aether is an indie fighting game set in a vast new world featuring a unique roster of characters.
results.name: Rivals of Aether

results.deck: Habitat is a strategy game based in the distant future where the player must create a sustainable base from the centuries of debris and junk floating in orbit around Earth.
results.name: Habitat

results.deck: Fortified! is an action strategy game set in 1950's sci-fi.
results.name: Fortified!

results.deck: A rugby game for the 2015 season, containing officially licensed teams and players from several European leagues.
results.name: Rugby 15

results.deck: Upcoming FPS inspired by Minecraft.
results.name: Gunscape

results.deck: A Sci-Fi Action-RPG from co-creators of Diablo and Torchlight, featuring heavy sandbox elements and large-scale ship battles.
results.name: Rebel Galaxy

results.deck: A follow up to Outlast from Red Barrels.
results.name: Outlast 2

results.deck: Top-down action strategy game where survivors of a plane crash must scour the tropical island they're stranded on for resources to build a seaworthy ship and find a way back to civilization.
results.name: Lost Sea

results.deck: Battlefield goes to the first World War for the first time.
results.name: Battlefield 1

results.deck: Free-to-play World War II strategy game.
results.name: Battle Islands

results.deck: Four Sided Fantasy is a 2D platformer that utilizes a "wrap around" screen effect as a gameplay mechanic.
results.name: Four Sided Fantasy

results.deck: Originally called Slasher Vol 1: Summer Camp, Friday the 13th: The Game is an asymmetrical multiplayer game. One player takes on the role of classic horror icon Jason Voorhees, while seven others play the role of camp counselors trying to survive and slay Jason.
results.name: Friday the 13th: The Game

results.deck: A roguelike adventure in a procedurally-generated post-societal America. Created by The Molasses Flood.
results.name: The Flame in the Flood

results.deck: A full-body Kinect game that mixes tennis, Breakout and gratuitous explosions.
results.name: Boom Ball For Kinect

results.deck: A stylish sci-fi team-based first-person shooter from Blizzard in which players can choose from over 20 unique Heroes, each with their own useful set of abilities.
results.name: Overwatch

results.deck: After many years of taking the franchise in different directions, Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 5 returns the Tony Hawk series to its roots.
results.name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 5

results.deck: An interactive TV show that utilizes the Kinect and Playstation camera. Based on the Nickelodeon TV show Rabbids Invasion.
results.name: Rabbids Invasion: The Interactive TV Show

results.deck: A PlayStation 4 and Xbox One re-release of Saints Row IV that comes bundled with all of its DLC, including the Gat Out of Hell expansion pack.
results.name: Saints Row IV: Re-Elected

results.deck: Battle a dictator's forces in a fictional Mediterranean archipelago in this follow-up to the popular series from Avalanche Studios and Square-Enix.
results.name: Just Cause 3

results.deck: A new take on Monopoly from Ubisoft.
results.name: Monopoly Family Fun Pack

results.deck: A compilation containing Fibbage XL, Drawful, Word Spud, Lie Swatter and You Don't Know Jack (2015).
results.name: The Jackbox Party Pack

results.deck: A 2D gothic action indie game from Korean developer Quattro Gear.
results.name: Black Witchcraft

results.deck: Wújìn Zhī Jiàn Mìngyùn (Infinity Blade Fate) is a Xbox One exclusive installment in the Infinity Blade series, released in China. It is a Kinect-powered compilation of different parts of the three previously released Infinity Blade titles.
results.name: Wújìn Zhī Jiàn Mìngyùn

results.deck: Set in 1868 London during the Industrial Revolution, players take on the role of sibling Assassins named Evie and Jacob Frye as they rally to overthrow the Templars in power. Developed by Ubisoft Québec for the PC, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One.
results.name: Assassin's Creed Syndicate

results.deck: The next game from Fullbright, the creators of Gone Home. What mysteries await, 200,000 miles from Earth?
results.name: Tacoma

results.deck: The sequel to The Banner Saga features familiar hand-drawn art, full orchestral soundtrack, and similar gameplay to the initial entry.
results.name: The Banner Saga 2

results.deck: A narrative game by bracket games.
results.name: Three Fourths Home

results.deck: The Naruto series jumps to eighth generation consoles with the fourth sequential installment of the Ultimate Ninja Storm series.
results.name: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4

results.deck: A four player co-op brawler staring undead vikings.
results.name: Zombie Vikings

results.deck: Ubisoft brings Risk to current gen consoles with a fancy high-tech war room front end.
results.name: Risk

results.deck: An 8 episode adventure game series set in the Minecraft world.
results.name: Minecraft: Story Mode

results.deck: A rallycross racing game where the player competes for a place on rally champion Sébastien Loeb's team.
results.name: Sébastien Loeb Rally Evo

results.deck: A remastering of Capcom's fourth Devil May Cry game featuring 3 additional playable characters, enhanced graphics and balance tweaks.
results.name: Devil May Cry 4: Special Edition

results.deck: Standpoint is a gravity shifting, first-person puzzle platformer exploring themes of Grief.
results.name: Standpoint

results.deck: A platformer starring a funky Perseus as he sets out to defeat Music Titans.
results.name: Funk of Titans

results.deck: Jotun is an hand-drawn action exploration game set in Norse mythology.
results.name: Jotun

results.deck: Join Zheros squad and fight your way through the twisted forces that threaten the universe in this beat 'em up developed by Rimlight Studios.
results.name: Zheros

results.deck: A turn-based tactical space combat game developed by Escape Hatch Entertainment.
results.name: Starlight Tactics

results.deck: An upcoming video game from Big Ant Studios, makers of Don Bradman Cricket. The game will feature official teams from the NRL, Super league and all accompanying lower leagues.
results.name: Rugby League Live 3

results.deck: A compilation containing Sniper Elite: Nazi Zombie Army 1 and 2, plus the previously unreleased Zombie Army 3.
results.name: Zombie Army Trilogy

results.deck: The 6th installment in the Forza Motorsport series. It is the first Motorsport game to feature night racing and wet weather conditions.
results.name: Forza Motorsport 6

results.deck: A single player/ local co-op puzzle platformer developed by Rock Pocket Games and published by Sierra.
results.name: Shiftlings

results.deck: The first game in the Enigmatis hidden object series.
results.name: Enigmatis: The Ghosts Of Maple Creek

results.deck: A horror action-RPG developed by Dontnod Entertainment. In Vampyr the player takes control of a vampiric doctor in the time period following World War I.
results.name: Vampyr

results.deck: An enhanced remaster of Borderlands 2 and Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel for PS4 and Xbox One including a new 4-player splitscreen mode for consoles.
results.name: Borderlands: The Handsome Collection

results.deck: A procedurally generated action RPG about resource gathering, rebuilding a lost world with terraforming powers, creating new islands and fighting off evil forces. Developed by former Ubisoft veterans.
results.name: Izle

results.deck: A top down action sports game.
results.name: ClusterPuck 99

results.deck: Like Continuum Shift before it, BlazBlue: Chrono Phantasma receives an "Extend" version, increasing the character count, developing further storylines, tweaking balance, and more.
results.name: BlazBlue: Chrono Phantasma Extend

results.deck: Lego Avengers is a Lego game based on the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
results.name: LEGO Marvel's Avengers

results.deck: Relive the action of all four Jurassic Park films - in LEGO video game form!
results.name: LEGO Jurassic World

results.deck: A gem-matching game from the creators of Puzzle Quest.
results.name: Gems of War

results.deck: A PlayStation 4 and Xbox One re-release of the Ninja Theory-developed DmC Devil May Cry, complete with new modes, difficulty levels, costumes, and gameplay tweaks.
results.name: DmC Devil May Cry: Definitive Edition

results.deck: Set 40 years after the events of Black Ops II, the twelfth installment of the Call of Duty series brings advanced robotics and biotic augmentations to the clandestine operations of the Black Ops storyline.
results.name: Call of Duty: Black Ops III

results.deck: A Left 4 Dead style co-op game, set in the Warhammer universe.
results.name: Warhammer: End Times – Vermintide

results.deck: A dungeon delve currently in development by Harebrained Schemes.
results.name: Necropolis

results.deck: OverStep is a Choose to Pay, Multiplayer Only, First Person Shooter. It is currently in development by Gamecan, and will be released for Xbox One and PC in 2015. The game will feature Robots fighting on a distant planet that is plagued by sudden extreme temperature and gravity shifts, all having an immediate impact on gameplay dynamics.
results.name: OverStep

results.deck: MLB's very own baseball franchise is returning for a second year with a handful of new features.
results.name: R.B.I. Baseball 2015

results.deck: In the style of the classic Baldur's Gate games, Sword Coast Legends is an all new D&D-licensed party-based RPG set in the Forgotten Realms campaign setting.
results.name: Sword Coast Legends

results.deck: A Trivial Pursuit video game from Ubisoft and the Hasbro Channel.
results.name: Trivial Pursuit Live!

results.deck: A third person, episodic, action adventure in which the player takes control of two unlikely friends.
results.name: Troll and I

results.deck: A nameless exploration robot awakens aboard a crash-landed ship on an uncharted world, and must negotiate a variety of puzzling and platforming dangers while learning more about the Planet of the Eyes through the encoded messages of a surviving crew member.
results.name: Planet of the Eyes

results.deck: Create your own modes and options in this dual-joystick shooter from Blazing Badger.
results.name: AIPD: Artificial Intelligence Police Department

results.deck: The makers of Pure Pool are bringing unprecedented levels of purity to the poker table.
results.name: Pure Hold'em

results.deck: Mutant Football League is a spiritual successor to EA's Mutant League Football.
results.name: Mutant Football League

results.deck: A game about being trapped in an ancient, half-submerged city.
results.name: Submerged

results.deck: A standalone expansion for Forza Horizon 2 developed by Playground Games to promote the latest Fast & Furious film "Furious 7".
results.name: Forza Horizon 2 Presents Fast & Furious

results.deck:
Hunger is a 2.5D "suspense adventure" game from Tarsier Studios. It stars a young girl attempting to make her way through an underwater labyrinth filled with monsters.

The art and gameplay take cues from Tarsier's previous project, LittleBigPlanet Vita. However, the story, world, and themes of the game are entirely unique.
results.name: Hunger

results.deck: Super Rude Bear Resurrection is a masocore platformer, but the corpses that are left behind can be used to make the game easier.
results.name: Super Rude Bear Resurrection

results.deck: A fast, arcade style cricket game that is based off the popular Tabletop game Test Match.
results.name: Tabletop Cricket

results.deck: An off-road kart racer developed by Vector Unit.
results.name: Beach Buggy Racing

results.deck: We Happy Few is a game from Compulsion Games, makers of Contrast. It is a first-person game set in a drug-fuelled, retro-futuristic city in an alternative 1960s England.
results.name: We Happy Few
